uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet

Class UserServlet<T extends AppUser>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.WebappServlet
          • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.SessionServlet
            • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.UserServlet<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(name="UserServlet",
            urlPatterns="/UserServlet/*")
public class UserServlet<T extends AppUser>
extends SessionServlet
    A servlet to allow a registered user to manage their identity.
    Author:
    spb

        protected boolean doChangePassword(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res,
                       AppContext conn,
                       PasswordAuthComposite<T> composite,
                       T person)
                            throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                   DataException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        doChangePassword Method. Allows users to change their SAF passwords
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        DataException
        java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        req - Request instance received from person_update.jsp.
        res - Response instance to be returned to person_update.jsp.
        conn - Connection to MySQL database for update queries.
        person - Current Person logged into the Web service.
        Returns:
        True if request processed without error, false if not.
